SELECT minBasicPay FROM positionView WHERE positionId=#{positionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO position (positionId, positionName, minBasicPay) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(positionId)+1, 1) FROM position), #{positionName}, TO_NUMBER(#{minBasicPay}))
mapper.update: UPDATE position SET positionName=#{positionName}, minBasicPay=TO_NUMBER(#{minBasicPay}) WHERE positionId=#{positionId}
